name: Trivy Scan for Docker and Code

steps.name: Configure PIP
steps.run: mkdir -p ~/.pip && echo '[global]' > ~/.pip/pip.conf && echo 'index-url = https://${{ secrets.ARTIFACT_USERNAME }}:${{ secrets.ARTIFACT_PASSWORD }}@${{ secrets.ARTIFACT_VIRTUAL_ENDPOINT }}' >> ~/.pip/pip.conf

steps.name: Install Dependencies
steps.run: python -m pip install --upgrade pip && pip install setuptools wheel twine --index-url=https://pypi.org/simple && pip install -r requirements.txt --no-cache-dir

steps.name: Build Docker Image
steps.run: docker build -t sws-dms-docker-image:latest --build-arg ARTIFACT_USERNAME=${{ secrets.ARTIFACT_USERNAME }} --build-arg ARTIFACT_PASSWORD=${{ secrets.ARTIFACT_PASSWORD }} --build-arg ARTIFACT_VIRTUAL_ENDPOINT=${{ secrets.ARTIFACT_VIRTUAL_ENDPOINT }} --build-arg PYTHON_DOCKER_IMAGE=3.10-alpine -f Dockerfile-github . --progress=plain

steps.name: Run Trivy Scan on Source Code
steps.run: echo "Running Trivy filesystem scan..." && trivy fs --severity CRITICAL,HIGH --format json --output trivy-source-report.json . && cat trivy-source-report.json || echo "No vulnerabilities found in source scan."

steps.name: Run Trivy Scan on Docker Image
steps.run: echo "Running Trivy image scan..." && trivy image --severity CRITICAL,HIGH --format json --output trivy-docker-report.json sws-dms-docker-image:latest && cat trivy-docker-report.json || echo "No vulnerabilities found in Docker scan."

steps.name: Check for Critical Vulnerabilities
steps.run: SOURCE_CRITICAL=$(jq '[.Results[]?.Vulnerabilities[]? | select(.Severity=="CRITICAL" or .Severity=="HIGH")] | length' trivy-source-report.json) && DOCKER_CRITICAL=$(jq '[.Results[]?.Vulnerabilities[]? | select(.Severity=="CRITICAL" or .Severity=="HIGH")] | length' trivy-docker-report.json) && echo "Source vulnerabilities found: $SOURCE_CRITICAL" && echo "Docker vulnerabilities found: $DOCKER_CRITICAL" && if [[ $SOURCE_CRITICAL -gt 0 ]]; then echo "fail_source=true" >> $GITHUB_ENV; else echo "fail_source=false" >> $GITHUB_ENV; fi && if [[ $DOCKER_CRITICAL -gt 0 ]]; then echo "fail_docker=true" >> $GITHUB_ENV; else echo "fail_docker=false" >> $GITHUB_ENV; fi

steps.name: Post Trivy Reports as a PR Comment
Fail Workflow if Critical Vulnerabilities Found
